title: Understanding the Context
text: Consider the broader context of your data inventory. What are the different privacy laws that could impact your users and business operations?

title: Think Beyond a Single Law
text: Instead of focusing on a single law, think about how multiple privacy laws might apply to your situation. How do these laws collectively influence your data practices?

hintAnswer: privacy laws that impact your users and businesses rather than just a specific law
title: Identify Relevant Privacy Laws
text: List the privacy laws that are relevant to your users and business. Consider both local and international regulations.
choices: privacy laws that impact your users and businesses rather than just a specific law
